Investigator Sally: Energy Plants recover your hit points by 70% and so far, I haven't noticed any adverse side-effects. Well... there's one thing. They can cause extremely bad gas. Like tear-inducing, face-meltingly bad gas. But it only lasts a short while! I love talking about plants! Want to know more?!
